snippet: Andy Murray is itching for a break after an exhausting few months, the world number two said, after defending champions Britain were knocked out by Argentina 3-2 in the Davis Cup semi-final....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray is itching for a break after an exhausting few months, the world number two said, after defending champions Britain were knocked out by Argentina 3-2 in the Davis Cup semi-final.

headline.print_headline: Exhausted Murray Desperate for a Break
headline.main: Exhausted Murray Desperate for a Break
